textContent:
--- future ---

I've stated this a few days ago, and I even told you that this will be mentioned in one of my letters kaya ayon, no surprises here HAHAHAHA. Daldal ko ih buset.

I just want you to know (again) na ever since I met you, everything has really been sunshine and rainbows, Rei. I live in the future. And with you, my vision of the future has been brighter than ever. 

One of my favorite topics whenever we talk is when we talk about our future together. Whether it be the decor that our house will have, our room setup, what kind of furniture we'll buy, and specially the name of our kids!! I love talking about those topics because I really feel included in your vision of the future too. I can no longer see a happy future without you Rei.

Thank you so much Rei!!! I'll do everything I can in order for us to have a happy future together.

And the best part? Doing that seems easy to me because I'll easily do everything for you. I love you Rei!

--- happy march 7th ---

Sinagot mo nako kahapon!!!! I just want to say thank you once again for being the best girlfriend that ever existed. You literally have everything there is to want. Ang ganda na. Ang bait pa. Ang sexy pa. Ang ganda pa ulit. Ang cute pa. Ang ganda pa ulit. Ang thoughtful pa. Ang sweet. Ang caring. Ang ganda pa ulit. Praise be Jesus and Mary nalang talaga. 

And thank you for the posts too!! Jusq, I feel really really appreciated because you love me so so much!  I really am thankful for all the effort you put into your posts, and how sweet and happy we are in them. The funny thing is, we are even happier in reality. Kaya tangina talaga ng mga tao sa reddit, wag silang epal HAHAHAHAHA. I feel na you are very proud to have me as your boyfriend, and I want you to know na I am really proud to call you mine as well.

--- bff hangout ---

Wala lang, I just want to talk about how cute that playlist is. And how cute it is that I get to create it with you. I never thought na a relationship could be this wholesome that we could even laugh about and talk about things like sex and all the naughty stuff. You really are a one of a kind person, and I wouldn't want anything else. Everything is happy and sweet and calm and comforting when I'm with you that I could really talk about anything with you. I've never been this comfortable with another person before and it feels so magical and wonderful and impossible. I love you Rei!
title: March 8, 2024
textContentHtml:
--- future ---


I've stated this a few days ago, and I even told you that this will be mentioned in one of my letters kaya ayon, no surprises here HAHAHAHA. Daldal ko ih buset.


I just want you to know (again) na ever since I met you, everything has really been sunshine and rainbows, Rei. I live in the future. And with you, my vision of the future has been brighter than ever. 


One of my favorite topics whenever we talk is when we talk about our future together. Whether it be the decor that our house will have, our room setup, what kind of furniture we'll buy, and specially the name of our kids!! I love talking about those topics because I really feel included in your vision of the future too. I can no longer see a happy future without you Rei.


Thank you so much Rei!!! I'll do everything I can in order for us to have a happy future together.


And the best part? Doing that seems easy to me because I'll easily do everything for you. I love you Rei!

Ang sexy pa. Ang ganda pa ulit. Ang cute pa. Ang ganda pa ulit. Ang thoughtful pa. Ang sweet. Ang caring. Ang ganda pa ulit. Praise be Jesus and Mary nalang talaga. 


And thank you for the posts too!! Jusq, I feel really really appreciated because you love me so so much!  I really am thankful for all the effort you put into your posts, and how sweet and happy we are in them. Wala lang, I just want to talk about how cute that playlist is. And how cute it is that I get to create it with you. I never thought na a relationship could be this wholesome that we could even laugh about and talk about things like sex and all the naughty stuff. You really are a one of a kind person, and I wouldn't want anything else. Everything is happy and sweet and calm and comforting when I'm with you that I could really talk about anything with you. I've never been this comfortable with another person before and it feels so magical and wonderful and impossible. I love you Rei!
